description:
An Integrated Development Environment for Java, developed mainly for educational purposes, but also suitable for small-scale software development.
	
It was developed to support the learning and teaching of object-oriented programming, and its design differs from other development environments as a result.

Oracle JDK is included with the installer allowing for portable usage. A non-JDK bundled version of [BlueJ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/bluej) is available.

#### Documentation
* [Features](http://www.bluej.org/about.html)
* [FAQ](http://www.bluej.org/faq.html)
* [Install instructions](http://www.bluej.org/generic-installation-instructions.html)
* [API](http://www.bluej.org/extensions/extensions.html)
* [Manual](http://www.bluej.org/objects-first/)

#### Community
* [Forum](http://blueroom.bluej.org/)
author: Michael Kölling
